short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empower ChatGPT with your own sources of data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Struggling with the chatbots because they don't have access to the internet sources of data? Ever wanted ChatGPT to review your doc or to analyze particular article from the internet?
ContextOn is a plugin which will solve this limitation for you!

How to use?
Simply go to the chat bot and start putting the urls in your prompt; they will be enriched with the context.

Some prompt ideas on how to make the most of it:
- Can you summarize the tips from my file <url>
- Can you make a 3 day visit plan in London using these notes: <url>
- Can you write a cover letter for this position: <url> based on my CV: <url>
- Can you find any grammar mistakes or vocabulary misuses in this document? <url>
- What is this article about? <url>

What's supported today?
Chatbots: currently we support ChatGPT only.
Urls:
- links to the open web resources, anything like reddit, wikipedia, stackoverflow, medium etc (https only).
- google docs and google sheets urls. The documents have to be open to the internet, i.e. shared to anyone with the link.
Length: text will be truncated by the maximum message length allowed by the chatbot.
